/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below.

On either side of the street, tall buildings rise, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. Among them, a large orange crane stands out, hinting at ongoing construction or development in the area. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Street lamps and traffic lights punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the crane, and gives a sense of looking up towards the sky. This perspective also allows for a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
